title: 2.1 Master Challenge 3
question: Write a program that inputs three positive numbers, a, b, and c, and determines whether they can form the three sides of a triangle. Check whether the triangle will be an obtuse-angled, a right-angled, or an acute-angled triangle. If the triangle is an acute-angled triangle, determine further whether the triangle is equilateral, isosceles, or scalene.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
